title: Credit Card Profitability
description: Credit cards are one of the most ubiquitous consumer financial products in the United States, with more than 75 percent of households owning at least one general purpose credit card in 2019. According to the G.19 Consumer Credit Statistical release, revolving consumer credit, which mainly consists of credit cards and related plans, stood at over one trillion dollars at the end of 2021.
dc:creator: Bord, Vitaly M.; Katcher, Bradley; Adams, Robert M.
